params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.codec
params.description: The codec for this audio stream. The default is aac. Supported audio codecs: - aac - aac-he - aac-he-v2 - mp3 - ac3 - eac3

params.name: data.bitrate_bps
params.description: Required. Audio bitrate in bits per second. Must be between 1 and 10,000,000.

params.name: data.channel_count
params.description: Number of audio channels. Must be between 1 and 6. The default is 2.

params.name: data.channel_layout
params.description: A list of channel names specifying layout of the audio channels. This only affects the metadata embedded in the container headers, if supported by the specified format. The default is ["fl", "fr"]. Supported channel names: - fl - Front left channel - fr - Front right channel - sl - Side left channel - sr - Side right channel - fc - Front center channel - lfe - Low frequency

params.name: data.mapping
params.description: The mapping for the Job.edit_list atoms with audio EditAtom.inputs.

params.name: data.sample_rate_hertz
params.description: The audio sample rate in Hertz. The default is 48000 Hertz.

methods.name: getChannelLayout
methods.description:
A list of channel names specifying layout of the audio channels.

This only affects the metadata embedded in the container headers, if supported by the specified format. The default is ["fl", "fr"]. Supported channel names:

  • fl - Front left channel
  • fr - Front right channel
  • sl - Side left channel
  • sr - Side right channel
  • fc - Front center channel
  • lfe - Low frequency

Generated from protobuf field repeated string channel_layout = 4;
